hackathon-description-text: Hackberry Pi is a 3.14-day long hackathon where teams work build projects involving the Raspberry Pi computer! There will be beginner, intermediate and advanced workshops throughout for participants to learn about how to use the Pi, as well as helpful mentors to guide participants! All CMU undergrads of all majors and ages are welcome. No prior experience is required, but basic programming knowledge will by helpful.
hackathon-eligibility: Current undergraduate students at Carnegie Mellon University in Pittsburgh, PA
hackathon-description-header: We supply the Raspberry Pis and Pies. You build something cool in 3.14 days.
